description: Partition action by tenant in common
facts: Ian and Julia own property as tenants in common with 50/50 shares
Ian wants to sell but Julia refuses
Ian files for partition of the property
The property cannot be physically divided
asp_facts: property_claim(claim5). claimant(claim5, ian). respondent(claim5, julia). claim_type(claim5, partition). property_type(claim5, real_property). ownership_type(claim5, tenancy_in_common). ownership_share_claimant(claim5, 50). ownership_share_respondent(claim5, 50). partition_requested(claim5, yes). physically_divisible(claim5, no). disagreement(claim5, yes).
question: Can Ian force a partition sale of the property?
rationale: A tenant in common has an absolute right to partition. When physical division is impractical, the court will order a partition by sale with proceeds split according to ownership shares.
